title: The Google Pixel 7 has an official launch date - but what else will the day bring?
description: Google has officially announced its launch event for its next line of products, a live event on October 6 in New York City. The Pixel 7, Pixel 7 Pro, Pixel Watch, and even some Nest products are expected.

title: This brutal hacking tool could steal virtually all of your logins
description: Facebook, Apple, Google, Microsoft logins all reportedly hackable with new EvilProxy service.

title: Qualcomm announces cheap chips in the shadow of Apple's A16 Bionic launch
description: Qualcomm has announced new Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 and Snapdragon 4 Gen 1 processors, for mid- to low-tier phones. The first phones will arrive next year. The announcement comes a day before Apple’s iPhone launch with new A16 chips.

title: Microsoft remembers it's 2022, says it will no longer accept check payments
description: It's time to say goodbye to checks, Microsoft says.

title: I tried TCL’s new Dolby Atmos soundbar, and Sonos should be worried
description: TCL’s new premium soundbar system delivers full-scale 7.1.4 Dolby Atmos audio at a surprisingly low price.

title: The Apple Watch is adding Microsoft's unsung productivity hero app
description: Microsoft is expanding its offering of Apple Watch apps, bringing To Do to your wrist.

title: Sick of buying a new Android phone every few years? Help is on the way
description: New EU rules could extend the lifespan of your next Android phone by years.

title: Apple TV Plus needs more than a passing showreel at the iPhone 14 launch
description: Apple should use the opportunity of its annual iPhone launch to place a marker in the sand for Apple TV Plus.

title: iPhone 14 Plus rumored release date, design, price, and key leaks
description: The iPhone 14 Plus or iPhone 14 Max is likely about to land, and we've heard lots about it.

title: Pokémon Go Psychic Spectacular 2022 – raids, research tasks, and Alakazam
description: Psychic Spectacular is Pokémon Go's next celebration event, and comes packed with exclusive rewards.

title: Google Meet is fixing another of the worst parts of video calls
description: 'Discrepancies in volume' could soon be a thing of the past on Google Meet.

title: Surfshark's back-to-school VPN deal gets full marks
description: With schools opening back up, be sure to secure your data with Surfshark's unmissable back-to-school VPN deal.

title: The Rings of Power's sparkling success can't save it from fan backlash
description: The Rings of Power is Prime Video's most successful premiere to date – so why has it been negatively received?

title: These fake Android antivirus apps install a dangerous banking trojan
description: If these Android antivirus apps serve up an update, uninstall them immediately.

title: QNAP NAS customers told to update now to protect against attack
description: Another DeadBolt ransomware attack targets QNAP NAS drives, and it’s affecting your photos.

title: New Nvidia RTX 4080 graphics card rumor is hard to believe
description: Nvidia could launch two RTX 4080 cards with 10GB and 12GB VRAM – but we doubt it...

title: D23 Expo 2022: start date and time, how to watch, Marvel, Star Wars, and more
description: Here's everything you need to know about D23 Expo 2022, the forthcoming Disney fan event, including what panels you can livestream.

title: Intel Arc flagship GPU is coming ‘very soon’ but won’t beat the Nvidia RTX 3060 Ti
description: Intel is being refreshingly honest about the reality and prospects of its much-delayed Arc desktop GPUs.

title: No, Apple isn't about to launch an Apple Watch for kids
description: New report suggests a super-affordable Apple Watch for kids is on the way, but it's probably only half right.

title: Love it or hate it, Windows 11's taskbar is here to stay - and it's getting improved
description: The taskbar finally looks to be getting features that users have been asking for since Windows 11 debuted.

title: iPhone 14 Pro’s camera lenses look set to be much bigger than the iPhone 13 Pro’s
description: A case leak all but confirms the iPhone 14 Pro's camera lenses will be growing.

title: Mark Zuckerberg reveals when Project Cambria will replace the Oculus Quest 2
description: Mark Zuckerberg has revealed that Project Cambria is arriving in October

title: TikTok hack: Have billions of user records been exposed?
description: TikTok says it has not suffered a data breach that exposed vast quantities of user data.

title: Vodafone satellite tech can pinpoint vehicles with centimetre accuracy
description: Vodafone believes new capabilities will advance V2X tech development.

title: OneWeb incurs $230m write down after cancelled Russian launches
description: OneWeb had been using Baikonur Cosmodrome to launch LEO satellites

title: Private Internet Access aces independent audit of its no-logs policy
description: Security firm confirms the leading provider does exactly what it states in its privacy policy: never storing sensitive users' data.
